CustomField.description: Number of days between the Hiring Need Validated Date through the Request Personnel Action Date
CustomField.formula: IF(IF(Request_Personnel_Action__c - Hiring_Need_Validated_Date__c < 0, NULL, Request_Personnel_Action__c - Hiring_Need_Validated_Date__c )>999,NULL,IF(Request_Personnel_Action__c - Hiring_Need_Validated_Date__c < 0, NULL, Request_Personnel_Action__c - Hiring_Need_Validated_Date__c ))
CustomField.label: # Days Hire Valid to Personnel Action
